original: kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi dgu po 'di dag med pa'i phyir yul gyis byas pa'i yid mi bde ba yang med kyi rgyus byas pa med pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi dgu po 'di dag med pa'i phyir yul gyis byas pa'i yid mi bde ba yang med kyi rgyus byas pa med pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhes ston par byed do //
translated: Because these nine bases of resentment do not exist, mental dissatisfaction produced by an object also does not exist.

original: rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i khong khro ba byas pa gang yin pa de ni rgyus byas pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i khong khro ba byas pa gang yin pa de ni rgyus byas pa yin la /
translated: Anger that exists in one’s own mindstream is produced by a cause.

original: kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi dgus byas pa gang yin pa de ni rkyen gyis byas pa yin no //
analyzed: kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi dgus byas pa gang yin pa de ni rkyen gyis byas pa yin no //
translated: Anger produced by the nine bases of resentment is produced by a condition.

original: gzugs can dang bde ba yang zhes bya ba'i yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gong du bshad pa sbyar bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzugs can dang bde ba yang zhes bya ba'i yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gong du bshad pa sbyar bar bya ba yin te /
translated: The words “and also” in the phrase “material form and pleasure” should be applied to the above.

original: de'i phyir pho dang mo'i dbang po dag dang bde ba dag dang dri ma med pa yang ma gtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir pho dang mo'i dbang po dag dang bde ba dag dang dri ma med pa yang ma gtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore the text should be applied as follows: “The faculties of male and female, and pleasure, and also the stainless are not produced by a cause.”

original: gzugs can gyi dbang po ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs can gyi dbang po ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: The material faculties are the eye faculty and so on.

original: bde ba dag ces bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dag ste /
analyzed: bde ba dag ces bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dag ste /
translated: The two that are called pleasure are by nature the feeling of pleasure.

original: bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dag go //🔽tshor ba gsum ni bde ba dang yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dag yin te /
analyzed: bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dag go // tshor ba gsum ni bde ba dang yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dag yin te /
translated: The two faculties of pleasure and mental pleasure are by nature the sensation of pleasure.🔽The faculty of pleasure is the sensation of pleasure of the stage of the third meditation.🔽The faculty of mental pleasure is the sensation of pleasure of the stages below the third meditation.🔽The faculty of equanimity is the sensation of neither pleasure nor suffering.

original: bde ba'i dbang po bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa //
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa //
translated: The faculty of equanimity is the sensation of neither pleasure nor suffering.🔽The faculty of equanimity is the sensation of neither pleasure nor suffering.

original: mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang yin pa de ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no //🔽de nyid na de las gzhan pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga pa 'dod pa na spyod pa dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gsum pa bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no //

original: bde ba'i dbang po'i zag pa med pa ni spang bar bya ba ma yin @100a * //🔽pa yin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po'i zag pa med pa ni spang bar bya ba ma yin @100a * //🔽pa yin no //
translated: The faculty of equanimity is the sensation of neither pleasure nor suffering.🔽The faculty of equanimity is the sensation

original: yid bde ba yang mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yid bde ba yang mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Mental satisfaction is abandoned by insight, since it is associated with that which is abandoned by insight.

original: de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: That which is associated with other than that is abandoned by cultivation.

original: zag pa med pa ni spang bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: zag pa med pa ni spang bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is uncontaminated is not to be abandoned.

original: btang snyoms ni thams cad na yod pa nyid pas rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: btang snyoms ni thams cad na yod pa nyid pas rtogs par sla'o //
translated: Equanimity exists in all, so it is easy to understand.

original: gnyis kyis spang ba yid mi bde zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba ma yin pa dang ldan pas yid bde ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis kyis spang ba yid mi bde zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba ma yin pa dang ldan pas yid bde ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: Mental dissatisfaction is abandoned by both. Mental dissatisfaction is not mental satisfaction, since it is associated with that which is not mental satisfaction.

original: de'i ngo bo ni yid bde ba ma yin pa nyid de //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni yid bde ba ma yin pa nyid de //
translated: Its nature is not mental satisfaction.

original: yid mi bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: yid mi bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: This is what is meant by mental dissatisfaction.

original: mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang ldan pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang ldan pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: That which is associated with that which is abandoned by insight is abandoned by insight.

original: de las gzhan pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i phyir spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni med do //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i phyir spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni med do //
translated: There is none that is not to be abandoned, because they are not concentrated states.

original: 'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis //
analyzed: 'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis //
translated: Two are acquired first in the desire realm.

original: rnyed de zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa rnams zhes bstan zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnyed de zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa rnams zhes bstan zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The term desire realm is explained as being taught as the desire realm because desire is predominant.

original: 'dod pa'i khams na sems can sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba rnams kyis dang po kho nar rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid kyi dbang po gnyis rnyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams na sems can sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba rnams kyis dang po kho nar rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid kyi dbang po gnyis rnyed par 'gyur te /
translated: In the desire realm, sentient beings born from eggs, from wombs, and from warmth and moisture first acquire two faculties that are the result of evolution.

original: lus kyi dbang po dang srog gi dbang po'o //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po dang srog gi dbang po'o //
translated: The body faculty and the life faculty.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can //
analyzed: skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can //
translated: Because birth existence is afflicted.

original: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kun //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kun //
translated: All afflictions of its level.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: because the mental faculty and the faculty of equanimity are definitely afflicted at the time of linking.

original: mig la sogs pa yang gnas skabs de na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa yang gnas skabs de na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the eyes and so on do not exist at that time.

original: rdzus te skyes pas min zhes bya ba ni dmigs kyis bsal ba ste /
analyzed: rdzus te skyes pas min zhes bya ba ni dmigs kyis bsal ba ste /
translated: The phrase “not for those born supernaturally” is an exception.

original: bye brag tu ma phye ba'i phyir rdzus te skye ba rnams kyis kyang de dang 'dra bar gnyis kho na zhig 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: bye brag tu ma phye ba'i phyir rdzus te skye ba rnams kyis kyang de dang 'dra bar gnyis kho na zhig 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur bas /
translated: Since it is not specified, it would follow that those born supernaturally would obtain just two faculties, as in the case of those born from eggs.

original: de lta bas na 'di bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di bkag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore this exception is stated.

original: ci rdzus te skye ba rnams kyis de gnyis ma rnyed pa kho na zhig yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci rdzus te skye ba rnams kyis de gnyis ma rnyed pa kho na zhig yin nam zhe na /
translated: Do those born supernaturally never obtain those two faculties?

original: rnyed par 'gyur mod kyi gnyis kho na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnyed par 'gyur mod kyi gnyis kho na ni ma yin te /
translated: They do obtain them, but not just two.

original: de'i phyir de yis drug gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yis drug gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par smos so //
translated: Therefore it says, “Those born supernaturally obtain six, seven, or eight faculties.”

original: gal te mtshan med pa zhig @100b yin na ste zhes bya ba ni gal te pho dang mo'i dbang po med pa zhig yin no //
analyzed: gal te mtshan med pa zhig @100b yin na ste zhes bya ba ni gal te pho dang mo'i dbang po med pa zhig yin no //
translated: if they are without the male or female faculty.🔽For example, the sentient beings of the first eon,

original: 'di ltar bskal ba dang po ba rnams lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni dus kyi dang po byung ba rnams te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bskal ba dang po ba rnams lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni dus kyi dang po byung ba rnams te /
translated: the sentient beings who appeared at the beginning of time.🔽They are like the sentient beings of the first eon.

original: snga byung sems can gzugs can bzhin //🔽zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga byung sems can gzugs can bzhin // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are like the sentient beings of the first eon.

original: drug dang zhe na /
analyzed: drug dang zhe na /
translated: Six faculties are obtained at the moment of rebirth in the intermediate existence and the existence at conception.

original: mig la sogs pa lnga dang drug pa srog gi dbang po'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa lnga dang drug pa srog gi dbang po'o //
translated: The five beginning with the eye and the sixth, the faculty of life force.

original: stsogs pa zhes bya ba'i ni sgras ni dmyal ba la sogs pa gzung ste /
analyzed: stsogs pa zhes bya ba'i ni sgras ni dmyal ba la sogs pa gzung ste /
translated: The word “etc.” includes the faculties of the nose and tongue.

original: srid pa bar ma dang skye ba'i srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na de dag dang por 'thob bo //
analyzed: srid pa bar ma dang skye ba'i srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i gnas skabs na de dag dang por 'thob bo //
translated: They obtain these faculties at the beginning of the intermediate existence and the existence at conception.

original: yang ci rdzus te skye ba dag la yang mtshan gnyis pa yod dam zhe na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang ci rdzus te skye ba dag la yang mtshan gnyis pa yod dam zhe na zhes bya ba la /
translated: Do those born supernaturally also have two organs?

original: klan ka ba'i bsam pa ni mtshan gnyis 'byung ba ni dman pa yin la rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas ni khyad par can yin na 'di gnyis ji ltar ldan snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: klan ka ba'i bsam pa ni mtshan gnyis 'byung ba ni dman pa yin la rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas ni khyad par can yin na 'di gnyis ji ltar ldan snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: The opponent thinks: “It is inferior to have two organs, and the miraculous birth is superior. How can these two be combined?”

original: gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs rnams zhes bstan te zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs rnams zhes bstan te zhes bya ba la /
translated: The form realm is called the form realm because form is primary there.

original: gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzugs rnams dang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzugs rnams dang ba'i phyir te /
translated: Form is primary there because form is clear there.

original: 'od gsal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that it is luminous.

original: rnam pa gcig tu gzugs kyi khams ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gtso bo ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu gzugs kyi khams ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gtso bo ma yin no //
translated: In one sense, the form realm is not primary in terms of the five sense objects.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is primary there?

original: gzugs tsam gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: gzugs tsam gtso bo yin te /
translated: Form alone is primary there.

original: gzugs med pa bzhin du gzugs med pa gtso bo yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa bzhin du gzugs med pa gtso bo yang ma yin no //
translated: Form is not primary there in the way that formless states are primary in the formless realm.🔽The sūtras also state that the form realm is called the form realm because form is primary there.

original: mdo las kyang zhes bya ba ni mdo las kyang 'di lta bu snang bas 'di bdag gis byas pa kho na ni ma yin no zhes bya bar ston pa yin no //
analyzed: mdo las kyang zhes bya ba ni mdo las kyang 'di lta bu snang bas 'di bdag gis byas pa kho na ni ma yin no zhes bya bar ston pa yin no //
translated: This is stated in the sūtras, so this is not something that we have invented.

original: gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das nas gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar ba zhi ba de dag kyang mi rtag pa mi brtan pa yid brtan du mi rung bar rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das nas gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar ba zhi ba de dag kyang mi rtag pa mi brtan pa yid brtan du mi rung bar rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Those who transcend form and attain the peaceful liberation of the formless realm should also understand that they are impermanent, unstable, unworthy of confidence, and subject to change.

original: rdzus te skye ba mtshan med pa dag gis rnyed pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni bskal ba dang po pa dag gis so //
analyzed: rdzus te skye ba mtshan med pa dag gis rnyed pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni bskal ba dang po pa dag gis so //
translated: The formless realm is obtained by those who are born supernaturally and lack physical form.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa ring ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir sngar gzugs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yin la phyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin pa de'i phyir gzugs kyi khams pas gzugs med pa'i khams gong ma yin no //🔽skye ba'i ma chog yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir skye @101a * //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa ring ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir sngar gzugs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yin la phyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin pa de'i phyir gzugs kyi khams pas gzugs med pa'i khams gong ma yin no // skye ba'i ma chog yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir skye @101a * //
translated: The formless realm is higher than the form realm because meditative attainment is distant.

original: ba'i sgo nas gzugs kyi khams pas gzugs med pa'i khams mchog yin te /
analyzed: ba'i sgo nas gzugs kyi khams pas gzugs med pa'i khams mchog yin te /
translated: The formless realm is higher than the form realm because of the superiority of birth.

original: de na bskal pa stong phrag du mar rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba de'i phyir yang 'di gong ma yin gyi skye ba'i yul gyi sgo nas ni ma yin te /🔽gzugs med khams na gnas med do //
analyzed: de na bskal pa stong phrag du mar rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba de'i phyir yang 'di gong ma yin gyi skye ba'i yul gyi sgo nas ni ma yin te / gzugs med khams na gnas med do //
translated: Since the karmic maturation of that is peace for many thousands of eons, it is higher than the first absorption, but it is not higher from the perspective of the place of birth.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said, “There is no abode in the formless realm.”

original: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni zhes bya ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba na ste gzugs med pa'i khams na ni dbang po 'di gsum kho na 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni zhes bya ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba na ste gzugs med pa'i khams na ni dbang po 'di gsum kho na 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one dies in the formless realm, these three faculties alone cease.

original: 'di ni dmigs kyis bsal ba dang bcas pa yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni dmigs kyis bsal ba dang bcas pa yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: This should be understood to be the exception.

original: dge la thams cad dag tu lnga //
analyzed: dge la thams cad dag tu lnga //
translated: All five in virtue.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said, “Eight in the form realm.”

original: gzugs na brgyad ces bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams ni de dag nyid mig la sogs pa lnga dang bcas te brgyad kho na cig car 'gag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzugs na brgyad ces bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams ni de dag nyid mig la sogs pa lnga dang bcas te brgyad kho na cig car 'gag par 'gyur te /
translated: In the form realm, these eight alone cease simultaneously, including the five such as the eyes.

original: dbang po tshang bar 'chi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po tshang bar 'chi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one dies with complete faculties.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdzus te skye ba thams cad ni dbang po rnams tshang bar skye zhing 'chi'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdzus te skye ba thams cad ni dbang po rnams tshang bar skye zhing 'chi'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “All those who are supernaturally born are born and die with complete faculties.”

original: 'dod par bcu 'am dgu 'am brgyad //
analyzed: 'dod par bcu 'am dgu 'am brgyad //
translated: In the desire realm, ten, nine, or eight cease.

original: ces bya ba ni mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin la gal te dbang po tshang na bcu 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin la gal te dbang po tshang na bcu 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one who is born with two organs has complete faculties, ten cease.

original: mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ni dgu'o //
analyzed: mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ni dgu'o //
translated: If one has one organ, nine cease.

original: mtshan med pa zhig yin na ni brgyad de /
analyzed: mtshan med pa zhig yin na ni brgyad de /
translated: If one is sexless, eight cease.

original: gal te dbang po ma tshang ba long ba'am 'on pa zhig yin na ni de'i tshe dbang po dbri bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te dbang po ma tshang ba long ba'am 'on pa zhig yin na ni de'i tshe dbang po dbri bar bya'o //
translated: If one is incomplete in faculties, blind, deaf, or the like, then one should subtract the faculties.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'di thams cad kyang dmigs kyis bsal ba dang bcas pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'di thams cad kyang dmigs kyis bsal ba dang bcas pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: All of this in the desire realm should be understood as having exceptions.

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba de bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba de bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the exceptions, it says:

original: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi //🔽zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi //🔽zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Four when dying gradually.

original: de rnams la ni so sor 'gag pa med do zhes bya ba 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i khams na phan tshun bral te 'gag pa med do snyam du bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams la ni so sor 'gag pa med do zhes bya ba 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i khams na phan tshun bral te 'gag pa med do snyam du bsam pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of this passage is that in the desire realm, they do not cease separately.

original: dge la kun tu lnga yang yin //
analyzed: dge la kun tu lnga yang yin //
translated: Also, when virtuous, there are five.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: This is🔽because the Abhidharmakosa states,

original: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
analyzed: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
translated: At death in the formless realm,

original: yid dang srog dang btang snyoms nyid //
analyzed: yid dang srog dang btang snyoms nyid //
translated: the mental faculty, life faculty, and equanimity🔽are relinquished.

original: ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'chi ba'i tshul gong du bshad pa thams cad kyi dmigs kyis bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'chi ba'i tshul gong du bshad pa thams cad kyi dmigs kyis bsal ba yin no //
translated: This is an exception to the general rule of death explained above.

original: 'chi ba'i sems ni rnam pa gsum srid de nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa dang dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i sems ni rnam pa gsum srid de nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa dang dge ba'o //
translated: There are three types of mind at death: afflicted, neutral, and virtuous.

original: @101b de la nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i 'chi ba'i tshul ni spyir bstan pa'i tshul gyis bshad zin to //
analyzed: @101b de la nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i 'chi ba'i tshul ni spyir bstan pa'i tshul gyis bshad zin to //
translated: The way of dying with an afflicted or neutral mind is explained by the general rule.

original: dge ba'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga bsnan par bya ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga bsnan par bya ste /
translated: When dying with a virtuous mind, add faith and so on.

original: dad pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni dge ba'i sems la gdon mi za bar yod do //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni dge ba'i sems la gdon mi za bar yod do //
translated: Faith and so on are necessarily present in a virtuous mind.

original: des na gang du gsum bshad pa der ni brgyad do //
analyzed: des na gang du gsum bshad pa der ni brgyad do //
translated: Therefore, where three are mentioned, eight are present.

original: gad du brgyad yin pa der ni bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: gad du brgyad yin pa der ni bcu gsum mo //
translated: Where eight are mentioned, thirteen are present.

original: gang du bcu yin pa der ni bco lnga'o //
analyzed: gang du bcu yin pa der ni bco lnga'o //
translated: Where ten are mentioned, fifteen are present.

original: gang du dgu yin pa der ni bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: gang du dgu yin pa der ni bcu bzhi'o //
translated: Where nine are mentioned, fourteen are present.

original: yang gang du brgyad yin pa der ni bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: yang gang du brgyad yin pa der ni bcu gsum mo //
translated: Where eight are mentioned, thirteen are present.

original: gang du bzhi yin pa der ni dgu'o zhes bya ba rgyas par brtsi bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang du bzhi yin pa der ni dgu'o zhes bya ba rgyas par brtsi bar bya'o //
translated: Where four are mentioned, nine are present.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa khams dag na ni rim gyis 'chi ba med do //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa khams dag na ni rim gyis 'chi ba med do //
translated: In the form and formless realms, there is no gradual death.🔽All phenomena of the faculties should be analyzed in the context of the faculties.

original: dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ste zhes bya ba ni kha cig na re dbang po'i skabs su bya ba ni dbang po'i chos te dbang po'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par ram byed pa'i khyad par thams cad dpyad par bya ste zhes
analyzed: dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ste zhes bya ba ni kha cig na re dbang po'i skabs su bya ba ni dbang po'i chos te dbang po'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par ram byed pa'i khyad par thams cad dpyad par bya ste zhes
translated: Some say: In the context of the faculties, all phenomena of the faculties, which are the specific states or functions of the faculties, should be analyzed.

original: zer ro // gzhan dag na re dbang po'i skabs te dbang po'i phung po las dbang po'i chos gnas skabs kyi khyad par ram byed pa'i khyad par thams cad dpyad de bstan bcos 'di yang bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsam pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zer ro // gzhan dag na re dbang po'i skabs te dbang po'i phung po las dbang po'i chos gnas skabs kyi khyad par ram byed pa'i khyad par thams cad dpyad de bstan bcos 'di yang bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsam pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: The topic of faculties is the analysis of all the phenomena of the faculties and their states and functions, and this treatise is a summary of that.

original: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus thob //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus thob //
translated: The last two results are obtained by nine.

original: ces bya ba ni dbang po dgu dag gis 'thob pa ni dgus 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni dbang po dgu dag gis 'thob pa ni dgus 'thob pa'o //
translated: Obtaining by nine faculties is obtained by nine.

original: gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: gang zhig ce na /
translated: What are they?

original: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis so //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis so //
translated: The last two results.

original: tha ma na 'dug pa ni tha ma dag go //
analyzed: tha ma na 'dug pa ni tha ma dag go //
translated: The last is the last two.

original: 'bras bu tha ma ni 'bras bu tha ma dag ste de gnyis so //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma ni 'bras bu tha ma dag ste de gnyis so //
translated: The last two results are the last two.

original: yang tha ma dag kyang gang yin zhe na rgyun du zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dbyug pa la tha ma gnyis yod pa de bzhin du sbrengs te 'dug pa rnams las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ni tha ma yin no //
analyzed: yang tha ma dag kyang gang yin zhe na rgyun du zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dbyug pa la tha ma gnyis yod pa de bzhin du sbrengs te 'dug pa rnams las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ni tha ma yin no //
translated: Just as a stick has two ends, so the fruits of stream-entry and of the state of a perfected being are the final fruits among the fruits that are arranged in a series.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni bar ma dag yin no //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni bar ma dag yin no //
translated: The fruits of once-returner and non-returner are the intermediate fruits.

original: 'bras bu tha ma de gnyis ni dbang po dgu kho nas 'thob ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma de gnyis ni dbang po dgu kho nas 'thob ste /
translated: Those two final fruits are obtained by nine faculties.

original: dgu po gang dag gis she na /🔽dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma @102a * //
analyzed: dgu po gang dag gis she na / dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma @102a * //
translated: By which nine?🔽They are obtained by nine faculties: the five such as faith, the faculties of mind, pleasure, and equanimity,

original: gtogs pa dag dang / yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang dgus 'thob ste zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gtogs pa dag dang / yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang dgus 'thob ste zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: and the faculty of one who has fully understood, excluding the faculty of one who has not fully understood.

original: de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ni 'di lta bu yin te sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa dang /🔽kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa dang / 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
analyzed: de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ni 'di lta bu yin te sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa dang / 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
translated: The stages of realization are as follows: the perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of suffering, the knowledge of the truth of suffering, the perseverance for the subsequent knowledge of the truth of suffering, the subsequent knowledge of the truth of suffering,🔽the perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of origin, the knowledge of the truth of origin, the perseverance for the subsequent knowledge of the truth of origin, the subsequent knowledge of the truth of origin, the perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of cessation,

original: 'gog pa la chos shes pa dang / 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa dang / lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / lam la chos shes pa dang / lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
analyzed: 'gog pa la chos shes pa dang / 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa dang / lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / lam la chos shes pa dang / lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
translated: the knowledge of the truth of cessation, the perseverance for the subsequent knowledge of the truth of cessation, the subsequent knowledge of the truth of cessation, the perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of path, the knowledge of the truth of path, the perseverance for the subsequent knowledge of the truth of path,🔽and the subsequent knowledge of the truth of path.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma bcu drug ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa zhes bya ba skad cig ma bcu drug ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The sixteen moments of subsequent knowledge of the truth of path are called clear realization abhisamaya.

original: de la de las skad cig pa cva lnga ni //
analyzed: de la de las skad cig pa cva lnga ni //
translated: Fifteen of those moments are the path of seeing.

original: ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam //
analyzed: ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam //
translated: Because it is said, “Fifteen moments are the path of seeing because one sees what was not previously seen.”

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa nas lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i bar skad cig ma bco lnga ni mthong ba'i lam yin te /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa nas lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i bar skad cig ma bco lnga ni mthong ba'i lam yin te /
translated: The fifteen moments from perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering up to perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of path are the path of seeing.

original: de ni kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called the faculty producing complete knowledge.

original: skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa de ni bsgom pa'i lam yin la /
analyzed: skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa de ni bsgom pa'i lam yin la /
translated: The sixteenth moment, subsequent knowledge of the truth of path, is the path of meditation.

original: de nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de nas bzung ste /
translated: From that point on,

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi zag pa med pa'i lam de thams cad kyang bsgom pa'i lam yin te /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi zag pa med pa'i lam de thams cad kyang bsgom pa'i lam yin te /
translated: all uncontaminated paths, up to and including the vajra like concentration, are the path of meditation.

original: de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called the faculty of complete knowledge.

original: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i gnas skabs na 'thob bo //
analyzed: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i gnas skabs na 'thob bo //
translated: The fruit of stream-enterer is obtained at the stage of acquiescence to subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path.

original: de na ni dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga gdon mi za bar yod de gnas skabs de ni dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na ni dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga gdon mi za bar yod de gnas skabs de ni dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, the five faculties of faith and so on definitely exist because that stage is virtuous.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid 'di ni da ltar gyi yin no //
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid 'di ni da ltar gyi yin no //
translated: Subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path is the nature of the faculty producing complete knowledge.

original: yid kyi dbang po yang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no //🔽mi lcogs pa med pa la brten pa yin pa'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang @102b gdon mi za bar yod do //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po yang de dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no // mi lcogs pa med pa la brten pa yin pa'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang @102b gdon mi za bar yod do //
translated: The faculty of mind is concomitant with it.🔽The faculty of equanimity definitely exists because it is based on unrestricted access concentration.

original: mi lcogs pa med pa ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Unrestricted access concentration is concomitant with the faculty of equanimity.

original: gnas skabs de na lam la rjes su shes pa kun shes pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid ni skye ba la mngon du phyogs bar 'dug pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs de na lam la rjes su shes pa kun shes pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid ni skye ba la mngon du phyogs bar 'dug pa yin no //
translated: At that stage, subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path, which is the nature of the faculty of complete knowledge, is present as that which is about to arise.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu de ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu de ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag ste /
translated: Therefore, it is obtained by nine faculties: the five such as faith, the faculty producing complete knowledge, the faculty of complete knowledge, the mental faculty, and the faculty of equanimity.

original: dgus 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgus 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One obtains it by both,

original: gnyi gas kyang de 'thob ste zhes bya ba ni de ni bar chad med pa'i lam kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid dang rnam par grol ba'i lam kun shes pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'thob bo //
analyzed: gnyi gas kyang de 'thob ste zhes bya ba ni de ni bar chad med pa'i lam kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid dang rnam par grol ba'i lam kun shes pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'thob bo //
translated: that is, it is obtained by the nature of the faculty producing complete knowledge, which is the uninterrupted path, and by the nature of the faculty of complete knowledge, which is the liberated path.🔽Because it respectively draws forth and supports the obtainment of separation.

original: go rims bzhin du 'bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang rten yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa'i lam ni bral ba'i thob pa de 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du 'bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang rten yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa'i lam ni bral ba'i thob pa de 'dren par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The uninterrupted path draws forth the obtainment of separation.

original: skye bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam ni de'i rten yin pa'i phyir te gzhi yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /🔽// / bam po bcu pa /🔽gnyis kyis chom rkun phyir phyung ba dang sgo bcad pa dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: skye bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam ni de'i rten yin pa'i phyir te gzhi yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / // / bam po bcu pa / gnyis kyis chom rkun phyir phyung ba dang sgo bcad pa dang 'dra ste /
translated: Because it generates the obtainment of freedom and because the liberated path is its basis, since it is the support for freedom.🔽It is like two people expelling a thief and closing the door.

original: ji ltar mi gnyis las gcig gis ni chom rkun phyir 'byin par byed cing gnyis pas de la sgo gcod par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar mi gnyis las gcig gis ni chom rkun phyir 'byin par byed cing gnyis pas de la sgo gcod par byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as one of two people expels a thief and the other closes the door,

original: bar chad med pa'i lam gyis ni bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed de /
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam gyis ni bral ba'i thob pa 'dren par byed de /
translated: the uninterrupted path draws forth the obtainment of freedom

original: nyon mongs pa'i thob pa blangs te 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i thob pa blangs te 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it seizes the obtainment of affliction and stops it.

original: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis ni rten byed de bral ba'i thob pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis ni rten byed de bral ba'i thob pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The liberated path supports it because it is simultaneously generated with the obtainment of freedom.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs na thob ste /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs na thob ste /
translated: The state of an arhat is obtained in the state of the vajra like concentration, except for faith and so on and the faculty of producing complete knowledge.

original: dad pa la sogs pa dang yid ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa dang yid ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Faith and so on and mind are as before.

original: gnas skabs de na bar chad med pa'i lam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kun shes pa'i dbang po ngo bo nyid ni da ltar gyi yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs de na bar chad med pa'i lam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kun shes pa'i dbang po ngo bo nyid ni da ltar gyi yin no //
translated: In that state, the faculty of producing complete knowledge, which is the vajra like concentration that is the uninterrupted path, is present.🔽Any one of the faculties of pleasure, mental satisfaction and equanimity is present.

original: bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig ces bya ba ni gal te bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob na ni de na bde ba'i dbang po da ltar gyi yin no //
analyzed: bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig ces bya ba ni gal te bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob na ni de na bde ba'i dbang po da ltar gyi yin no //
translated: If one obtains the state of an arhat in dependence on the third absorption, then the faculty of pleasure is present.

original: @103a * // 'on te bsam gtan dang po'am gnyis pa la brten nas 'thob na ni de na yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no //
analyzed: @103a * // 'on te bsam gtan dang po'am gnyis pa la brten nas 'thob na ni de na yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no //
translated: If it is obtained in dependence on the first or second absorption, then it is the faculty of mental satisfaction.

original: ji ste mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang rnam shes dang nam mkha' dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig la brten nas 'thob na ni de na btang snyoms kyi dbang po
analyzed: ji ste mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi pa dang rnam shes dang nam mkha' dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig la brten nas 'thob na ni de na btang snyoms kyi dbang po
translated: If it is obtained in dependence on unrestricted access concentration, special absorption, the fourth absorption, the base of infinite consciousness, or the base of nothingness, then it is the faculty of equanimity.

original: da ltar gyi yin no //
analyzed: da ltar gyi yin no //
translated: It is present in the present.

original: gnas skabs 'di na rnam par grol ba'i lam zad pa shes pa'i tshogs kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid ni skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs 'di na rnam par grol ba'i lam zad pa shes pa'i tshogs kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'i ngo bo nyid ni skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa yin no //
translated: In this situation, the faculty of final and perfect knowledge, which is the nature of the knowledge of elimination on the path of liberation, is directed toward birth.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu de ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu de ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig ste /
translated: Therefore, that result is obtained by nine faculties: any one of the five such as faith, the faculty of understanding, the faculty of possessing complete knowledge, the mental faculty, and any one of the faculties of pleasure, mental satisfaction, or equanimity.

original: dgus 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgus 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Obtained by nine,

original: de ni bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dag gis 'thob ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dag gis 'thob ces bya ba ni /
translated: it is obtained by the uninterrupted path and the liberated path.

original: snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
translated: This should be explained as before.🔽Two are obtained by seven, eight, or nine.

original: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma yin no //
translated: The result is obtained by seven, eight, or nine faculties.🔽Each is obtained by seven, eight, or nine.

original: re re zhing zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag gis 'thob la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: re re zhing zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag gis 'thob la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The result of once-returner is obtained by seven, eight, or nine faculties. The result of non-returner is also like that.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To explain that, it is said:

original: re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de la yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de la yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If the result of once-returner is attained gradually, and if it is attained by the mundane path, then the mundane path is the uninterrupted path.

original: 'jig rten pa'i lam ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i lam ni /
translated: The mundane path

original: zhi sogs rags sogs rnam pa can //
analyzed: zhi sogs rags sogs rnam pa can //
translated: has the aspects of calm, etc., and coarseness, etc.

original: gong dang 'og ma spyod yul can //
analyzed: gong dang 'og ma spyod yul can //
translated: It has the upper and lower realms as its object.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir zhi ba la sogs pa dang rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can yin te /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir zhi ba la sogs pa dang rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can yin te /
translated: Because it is said that the mundane path has the aspects of calm, etc., and coarseness, etc.,

original: des na 'di na rnal 'byor pa sa gong ma la ni zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung bar lta la 'og ma ni rags pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang rtsig pa stug po lta bur lta'o //
analyzed: des na 'di na rnal 'byor pa sa gong ma la ni zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung bar lta la 'og ma ni rags pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang rtsig pa stug po lta bur lta'o //
translated: Here, yogis view the upper realm as calm, sublime, and a definite release, and they view the lower realm as coarse, suffering, and like a thick wall.

original: de yang rnam pa bzhir brjod de /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa bzhir brjod de /
translated: That is said to be of four types:

original: sbyor ba'i lam dang bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang khyad par can gyi lam mo //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i lam dang bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang khyad par can gyi lam mo //
translated: the path of preparation, the uninterrupted path, the path of liberation, and the special path.

original: de la sbyor ba'i lam ni gang la bar chad med pa'i lam skye ba ste /
analyzed: de la sbyor ba'i lam ni gang la bar chad med pa'i lam skye ba ste /
translated: The path of preparation is that on which the uninterrupted path arises.

original: de yang gang gis na nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang gang gis na nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar byed pa yin no //

analyzed: rnam @103b par grol ba'i lam yang bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mjug thogs su skye ba ste /

original: nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i thob pa'i rten byed pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i thob pa'i rten byed pa yin no //

original: khyad par can gyi lam ni de yan chad kyi lam khyad par can yin te /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi lam ni de yan chad kyi lam khyad par can yin te /
translated: The special path is the path that is superior to that.

original: lam des ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po dang chen po'i 'bring po dang chen po'i chung ngu dang / 'bring po'i chen po dang 'bring po dang 'bring po'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang chung ngu'i 'bring po dang chung ngu'i chung ngu zhes bya ba dgu spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: lam des ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po dang chen po'i 'bring po dang chen po'i chung ngu dang / 'bring po'i chen po dang 'bring po dang 'bring po'i chung ngu dang / chung ngu'i chen po dang chung ngu'i 'bring po dang chung ngu'i chung ngu zhes bya ba dgu spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: By means of that path, one abandons nine categories of defilements: the great of the great, the medium of the great, the small of the great, the great of the medium, the medium of the medium, the small of the medium, the great of the small, the medium of the small, and the small of the small.

original: de la gal te so so'i skye bo zhig spong bar byed na ni des mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bsres te chung ngu dang chen po la sogs pa'i bye brag gi rnam par dgur byas nas spong ste /
analyzed: de la gal te so so'i skye bo zhig spong bar byed na ni des mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bsres te chung ngu dang chen po la sogs pa'i bye brag gi rnam par dgur byas nas spong ste /
translated: If an ordinary being abandons afflictions, he abandons the afflictions to be abandoned by the paths of seeing and meditation by mixing them and making them into nine types such as small and great.

original: bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu dag gis ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po spong la /
analyzed: bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam chung ngu'i chung ngu dag gis ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chen po'i chen po spong la /

original: de bzhin du bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam chen po'i chen po dag gis ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du spong ngo //

translated: Similarly, the uninterrupted and liberated paths that are great of the great abandon the small of the small afflictions.

original: 'phags pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dag kho na de bzhin du rnam pa dgur byas nas spong ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dag kho na de bzhin du rnam pa dgur byas nas spong ste /
translated: Aryas abandon the afflictions to be abandoned by the path of meditation by making them into nine types in the same way.

original: mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni mthong ba'i lam gyis sngar spangs zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni mthong ba'i lam gyis sngar spangs zin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de la mthar gyis pa ni gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas rim gyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa @104a * //

analyzed: gal te rnam pa gcig la sogs pa spangs la rnam pa drug pa ma spangs par nges pa la 'jug pa yin te /
translated: or one who enters the state of being determined to be a stream enterer after abandoning one or more types of the nine degrees of objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation, but not the sixth type.

analyzed: de ni sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug pa la rgyun du zhugs pa yin no // de zhi gnas spyad pa yin pa'i phyir ba sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa gcig gam drug pa kho na'i bar spang bar bya ba'i don du 'jig rten pa'i lam yang skyes par byed na ni de rnam pa drug spangs na lan cig phyir 'ong
translated: That person is a stream enterer on the sixteenth moment of mind.

original: ba'i 'bras bu 'thob la /
analyzed: ba'i 'bras bu 'thob la /
translated: If that person, who is a serial abandoner, generates the mundane path in order to abandon one or two types of the nine degrees of objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation up to six types, in order to cultivate serenity, then when he abandons the sixth type of affliction, he obtains the result of once return.

original: 'bras bu de ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang yid kyi dbang po lnga dang mi lcogs pa med pa la brten pa yin pa'i phyir bdun pa btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'bras bu de ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang yid kyi dbang po lnga dang mi lcogs pa med pa la brten pa yin pa'i phyir bdun pa btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo //
translated: It is obtained by seven faculties because it is based on the five such as faith, the five faculties such as the faculty of mental satisfaction, and the faculty of equanimity that is not overwhelmed.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dag kho na dang brgyad pa kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dag kho na dang brgyad pa kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste /
translated: If it is obtained by the transcendent path, it is obtained by eight faculties because it is obtained by those seven and the faculty of complete knowledge.

original: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po de dag kho na zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po de dag kho na zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo //
translated: The faculties of faith and so on are called the faculty of complete knowledge because they are uncontaminated.🔽If it is obtained by one who is free from attachment to the desire realm, it is obtained by nine faculties.

original: ci ste phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni zhes bya ba ni gang zhig so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis rnam pa drug pa spangs par gyur pa rnam pa phal cher las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
analyzed: ci ste phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni zhes bya ba ni gang zhig so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis rnam pa drug pa spangs par gyur pa rnam pa phal cher las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i
translated: If it is obtained by one who is free from attachment to the desire realm, it is obtained by nine faculties because it is obtained by those seven and the faculty of mental satisfaction and the faculty of pleasure.

original: phyir phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phyir phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ste /
translated: He is called “one who is mostly free from attachment” because he is mostly free from attachment to the desire realm.

original: gal te des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa na'o //
analyzed: gal te des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa na'o //
translated: If he obtains the result of a once-returner,

original: ji ltar 'thob ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'thob ce na /
translated: how does he obtain it?

original: gong du bshad pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim gyis lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i gnas skabs na 'thob bo //
analyzed: gong du bshad pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim gyis lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i gnas skabs na 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains it by the process of clear realization explained above, in the stage of perseverance for the knowledge of the truth of the path.🔽He obtains it with nine faculties,

original: dgus 'thob ste gang dag kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa yin no zhes bya ba ni dad pa la sogs pa dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang zhes bya🔽ba snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: dgus 'thob ste gang dag kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa yin no zhes bya ba ni dad pa la sogs pa dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
translated: with the exception of the faculty of understanding all and the faculty of perfect knowledge, as explained above.

original: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar skad cig ma bcu drug pa kho na la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar skad cig ma bcu drug pa kho na la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is a once-returner who has not obtained the result of stream entry, but who becomes a once-returner in the sixteenth moment alone.

original: gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la zhes bya ba la /🔽'dir @104b mthar gyis pa ni gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob nas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am gang zhig phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa kho
analyzed: gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la zhes bya ba la / 'dir @104b mthar gyis pa ni gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob nas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am gang zhig phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa kho
translated: If one who obtains the result of nonreturn by skipping realizes the result of an arhat, he obtains it by eight.🔽Here, one who skips is one who obtains the result of stream entry and the result of once-returner and then obtains the result of nonreturn.

original: nar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid thob nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa yin no //
analyzed: nar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid thob nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa yin no //
translated: Or it is one who, having become free from attachment to the desire realm, obtains the result of once-returner without obtaining the result of stream entry and then obtains the result of nonreturn.

original: de yang gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis ba ji lta ba bzhin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis ba ji lta ba bzhin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: If one who skips obtains the result of nonreturn by the mundane path, he obtains it by seven faculties, just like one who obtains the result of once-returner by skipping.

original: dad pa la sogs pa dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag gis 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag gis 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: He obtains it by the seven faculties of faith and so on, the mental faculty and the faculty of equanimity.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de brgyad kyis 'thob ste de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ji lta ba kho na bzhin no //
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de brgyad kyis 'thob ste de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ji lta ba kho na bzhin no //
translated: If it is obtained by the supramundane path, it is obtained by eight, like the former.

original: brgyad kyis 'thob ces bya ba ni tha tshig go //
analyzed: brgyad kyis 'thob ces bya ba ni tha tshig go //
translated: Obtained by eight means that.

original: brgyad pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no //🔽ji ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis thob na ni zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis rnam pa dgu pa spangs te /
analyzed: brgyad pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no // ji ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis thob na ni zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis rnam pa dgu pa spangs te /
translated: The eighth is the faculty of final and perfect knowledge.🔽If it is obtained by one who is free from attachment,

original: 'dod pa'i khams tsam las 'dod chags dang bral ba'am bsam gtan dang po nas ci yang med pa'i bar las kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams tsam las 'dod chags dang bral ba'am bsam gtan dang po nas ci yang med pa'i bar las kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob bo //
translated: if one who is free from attachment to the desire realm through abandoning the ninth stage by the mundane path, or if one who is free from attachment to the first absorption up to nothingness obtains the fruit of nonreturn, it is obtained by nine.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob la 'di yang mthong ba'i lam kho nas 'thob pas 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob la 'di yang mthong ba'i lam kho nas 'thob pas 'dra ba yin no //
translated: It is similar to the result of stream entry, because the result of stream entry is obtained by the path of seeing and this is also obtained by the path of seeing alone.

original: 'di ni khyad par yin gyi /🔽rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig yin no zhes bya ba ni gal te bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na ni de la bde ba'i dbang po
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par yin gyi / rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig yin no zhes bya ba ni gal te bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug na ni de la bde ba'i dbang po
translated: This is the difference.🔽It is obtained by the faculty of pleasure, mental satisfaction or equanimity, since it is distinguished by its basis.🔽If one enters the state of an arhat in dependence on the third absorption, then the faculty of pleasure is dominant.

original: yin no // 'on te bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa la brten nas 'jug na ni de na yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no //
analyzed: yin no // 'on te bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa la brten nas 'jug na ni de na yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no //
translated: If one enters in dependence on the first or second absorption, then the faculty of mental satisfaction is dominant.

original: ci ste mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig la brten nas 'jug pa na ni de na btang snyoms kyi dbang po yin no //
analyzed: ci ste mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig la brten nas 'jug pa na ni de na btang snyoms kyi dbang po yin no //
translated: If one enters the state of nondiscernment by relying on any of the four absorptions, such as unrestricted access concentration, special absorption or the fourth absorption, then equanimity is the dominant faculty.

original: gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la @105a * //🔽zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis ba ste sngon 'bras bu thob pa dbang po rnon po zhig yin la de rnam na yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la @105a * // zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis ba ste sngon 'bras bu thob pa dbang po rnon po zhig yin la de rnam na yin te /
translated: If this person is a gradual entrant🔽If this person is a gradual entrant who previously obtained the result of nonreturn and is now sharp faculty, then if he enters the actual basis of the fourth absorption, he obtains the result of nonreturn by means of eight faculties.

original: gal te 'jug na de na yang btang snyoms kyi dbang po gzhi'i bsam gtan la 'jug pa de'i tshe yang dbang po brgyad kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ste /
analyzed: gal te 'jug na de na yang btang snyoms kyi dbang po gzhi'i bsam gtan la 'jug pa de'i tshe yang dbang po brgyad kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ste /
translated: If he enters the actual basis of the fourth absorption, then at that time he obtains the result of nonreturn by means of eight faculties,

original: de la rnam par grol ba'i lam ni bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhis bsdus pa yin la de na ni yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam par grol ba'i lam ni bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhis bsdus pa yin la de na ni yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no //
translated: because the liberated path is subsumed by the actual basis of the fourth absorption and at that time the faculty of mental satisfaction exists.

original: bar chad med pa'i lam ni mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam ni mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa kho na yin te /
translated: The uninterrupted path is subsumed by unrestricted access concentration.

original: gal te 'jug na de na yang btang snyoms kyi dbang po kho na yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'jug na de na yang btang snyoms kyi dbang po kho na yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: If one enters the state of composure without conception, then only the faculty of equanimity is present there, not the others.

original: de na dad pa la sogs pa ldan dang yi dang btang snyoms dang yid bde ba'i dbang po dag dang brgyad kyis 'thob bo //
analyzed: de na dad pa la sogs pa ldan dang yi dang btang snyoms dang yid bde ba'i dbang po dag dang brgyad kyis 'thob bo //
translated: One enters the state of composure without conception through eight faculties: the five beginning with faith, the faculties of pleasure, mental pleasure, and equanimity.

original: de ni gnyi gas kyang 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dag gis so //
analyzed: de ni gnyi gas kyang 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dag gis so //
translated: One enters the state of composure without conception through both of these, i.e., through the uninterrupted and liberation paths.

original: chom rkun phyir 'byin pa dang sgo gcod pa bzhin te 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: chom rkun phyir 'byin pa dang sgo gcod pa bzhin te 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: This is like expelling a thief and locking the door. This has already been explained.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'jug na ni zhes bya ba ni mthar gyis pa dbang po rnon po de nyid yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'jug na ni zhes bya ba ni mthar gyis pa dbang po rnon po de nyid yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: If one enters the state of composure without conception through the supramundane path, then one should understand that this refers to the sharp faculty who enters gradually.

original: skabs la bab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skabs la bab pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the opportunity has arisen.

original: de dbang po dgus 'thob pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dbang po de dag kho na dang dgu ba ku shes pa'i dbang pos te /
analyzed: de dbang po dgus 'thob pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i dbang po de dag kho na dang dgu ba ku shes pa'i dbang pos te /
translated: One enters the state of composure without conception through nine faculties: the eight faculties that have just been explained, plus the faculty of complete knowledge.

original: dbang po de dag nyid zag pa med pa'i phyir kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: dbang po de dag nyid zag pa med pa'i phyir kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo //
translated: These faculties are called the faculty of final knowledge because they are uncontaminated.

original: 'dir 'di brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'di brjod par bya ste /
translated: Here, this should be stated:

original: ci'i phyir mthar gyis pa kho na bshad kyi /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mthar gyis pa kho na bshad kyi /
translated: Why is the serial abandoner alone explained,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: but not the one who is previously freed from attachment?

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'bro ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te mthong ba'i lam bskyed pas sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug pa la bsam gtan dang po'i dngos gzhi la 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'bro ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa la brten te mthong ba'i lam bskyed pas sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug pa la bsam gtan dang po'i dngos gzhi la 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: The one who is previously freed from attachment does not enter the actual basis of the first absorption in the sixteenth moment of mind, because he generates the path of seeing in dependence on unrestricted access concentration.

original: thob zin pa de la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thob zin pa de la ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has already obtained that.

original: mthar gyis pa ni dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan don du gnyer ba yin te /
analyzed: mthar gyis pa ni dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan don du gnyer ba yin te /
translated: The serial abandoner seeks the actual basis of absorption,

original: de sngon ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sngon ma thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he has not previously obtained it.

original: de lta bas na 'di dngos gzhi kho na la 'jug pa gang yin pa ni srid pa yod do //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di dngos gzhi kho na la 'jug pa gang yin pa ni srid pa yod do //
translated: Therefore, it is possible that the one who enters the actual basis alone is the serial abandoner.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba ni bden pa bzhi mthong ba la gus pa byas pa yin gyi bsam gtan la ni ma yin pas sems kyi skad cig ma bcu @105b drug pa de la dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan la mi 'jug go snyam du bsam
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba ni bden pa bzhi mthong ba la gus pa byas pa yin gyi bsam gtan la ni ma yin pas sems kyi skad cig ma bcu @105b drug pa de la dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan la mi 'jug go snyam du bsam
translated: Those previously freed from attachment respect seeing the four truths, but not the absorptions. Therefore, they do not enter the actual basis of absorption on the sixteenth moment of mind.

original: pa yin no //
analyzed: pa yin no //
translated: This is the thought.

original: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob //
translated: The last two results are obtained by nine.

original: ces bshad pa de 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ces bshad pa de 'gal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: This is stated to show that this explanation contradicts the Abhidharmakośa.

original: 'o na chos mngon pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'o na chos mngon pa las zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If it is said that the Abhidharmakośa declares:

original: yi shes la 'jug pa las dbang po du dag gcig gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob ce na /
analyzed: yi shes la 'jug pa las dbang po du dag gcig gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob ce na /
translated: By how many faculties is arhatship obtained?

original: bcu gcig gis 'thob po zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar mi 'gal snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: bcu gcig gis 'thob po zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar mi 'gal snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: It is explained that it is obtained by eleven.

original: 'ga' zhig srid phyir zhes bya ba ni gang zag gcig 'ga' zhig la srid kyi thams cad la srid pa ni ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig srid phyir zhes bya ba ni gang zag gcig 'ga' zhig la srid kyi thams cad la srid pa ni ma yin pa ste /
translated: The term some means that it is possible for some one person, but it is not possible for all.

original: dbang po rtul po 'ga' zhig yongs su nyams shing yongs su nyams nas rten gyi bye brag gis bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnam grangs pa dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'di skad du bcu gcig
analyzed: dbang po rtul po 'ga' zhig yongs su nyams shing yongs su nyams nas rten gyi bye brag gis bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnam grangs pa dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'di skad du bcu gcig
translated: Some of dull faculty who degenerate and then attain the state of an arhat through the specific support of the faculty of either pleasure, mental satisfaction or equanimity, which are respectively obtained or possessed.🔽Therefore it is said that the state of an arhat is obtained through eleven faculties.

original: gis shes bshad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni rdzas re re zhig skye ba'i phyir bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams dus gcig tu phrad pa srid pa ni med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gis shes bshad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni rdzas re re zhig skye ba'i phyir bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams dus gcig tu phrad pa srid pa ni med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: But since minds and mental factors arise as individual substances, it is impossible for the faculties of pleasure, mental satisfaction and equanimity to meet simultaneously.

original: gang zag dbang po rtul po gang zhig mi lcogs pa med pa 'am gzhan gyi btang snyoms kyi dbang po la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par byed na de'i ni de'i btang snyoms kyi dbang pos 'thob pa yin no //

translated: If a person of dull faculty obtains the state of an arhat in dependence on the faculty of equanimity of unrestricted access concentration or another level, then it is obtained by the faculty of equanimity.

original: de las kyang yongs su nyams par gyur te de'i 'og tu yang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par byed na de'i de ni yid bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang yongs su nyams par gyur te de'i 'og tu yang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa la brten nas dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob par byed na de'i de ni yid bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa yin no //
translated: If one obtains the state of an arhat by relying on the first and second absorptions, then one obtains it by means of the faculty of mental satisfaction.

original: yang de las kyang yongs su nyams par gyur te de'i 'og tu yang de bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas dgras bcom pa nyid 'thob par byed na ni de ni bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa yin no //
analyzed: yang de las kyang yongs su nyams par gyur te de'i 'og tu yang de bsam gtan gsum pa la brten nas dgras bcom pa nyid 'thob par byed na ni de ni bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa yin no //
translated: If one obtains the state of an arhat by relying on the third absorption, then one obtains it by means of the faculty of pleasure.

original: 'bras bu 'thob pa de la dad la sogs pa lnga dang yid dang kun shes pa dang kun shes par ldan pa'i dbang po rnams dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po las gang yang rung ba zhig ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'thob pa de la dad la sogs pa lnga dang yid dang kun shes pa dang kun shes par ldan pa'i dbang po rnams dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po las gang yang rung ba zhig ste /
translated: In obtaining that result, one obtains it by means of any one of the faculties of pleasure, mental satisfaction, or equanimity, the five such as faith, the mental faculty, and the faculty of either understanding, having understood, or possessing complete knowledge.

original: dbang po dgu ni re re la bya ba byed pa yin la /
analyzed: dbang po dgu ni re re la bya ba byed pa yin la /
translated: Nine faculties function in each case.

original: de yang dang yang 'thob pa'i phyir bcu gcig gis zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang dang yang 'thob pa'i phyir bcu gcig gis zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Since one obtains that result again and again, it is explained that one obtains it by means of eleven faculties.

original: 'di phyir mi 'ong ba la yang ji ltar thal bar @106a * //
analyzed: 'di phyir mi 'ong ba la yang ji ltar thal bar @106a * //
translated: Why doesn't it follow that nonreturners also obtain it?🔽Why does the treatise Attainment of Knowledge explain that the result of arhat is obtained by eleven alone and not that the result of nonreturn is also obtained by eleven?

original: mi 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir bstan bcos de las dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu kho na bcu gcig gis 'thob pa zhes bshad kyi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang zhes ni ma bshad ce na /
analyzed: mi 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir bstan bcos de las dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu kho na bcu gcig gis 'thob pa zhes bshad kyi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang zhes ni ma bshad ce na /
translated: It is said:🔽From now on, never again will they obtain it by the faculty of pleasure.

original: 'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba 'di bsam gtan gsum pa yan chad kyi sa thob po zhes pa las /
analyzed: 'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba 'di bsam gtan gsum pa yan chad kyi sa thob po zhes pa las /
translated: This refers to the fact that nonreturners obtain the level of the third absorption and above.

original: sa gong ma nyid las yongs su nyams par gyur na 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa zhes mi bya ste /
analyzed: sa gong ma nyid las yongs su nyams par gyur na 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa zhes mi bya ste /
translated: If they fully degenerate from the higher level, they do not fully degenerate from the result of nonreturn.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The same applies for the level of the second absorption and below.

original: gang gi tshe dang po las yongs su nyams par gyur pa de'i tshe ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dang po las yongs su nyams par gyur pa de'i tshe ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa zhes bya ste /
translated: When one first regresses, then one is said to regress from the result of non-return.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga spangs pa'i sgo nas rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga spangs pa'i sgo nas rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The result of non-return is established by the abandonment of the five factors that are conducive to the inferior.

original: gang gi tshe de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe ni bsam gtan gsum pa med na de ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa de'i tshe ni bsam gtan gsum pa med na de ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob par 'gyur /
translated: When one regresses from freedom from attachment to the desire realm, if the third absorption does not exist, then how does one obtain the result of non-return by means of the faculty of pleasure?

original: de'i phyir 'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore it is explained that after one regresses, one never obtains it by means of the faculty of pleasure.

original: 'di yid bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob par 'gyur ram ci na gang gi phyir bde ba'i dbang po kho na 'gog ce na /
analyzed: 'di yid bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob par 'gyur ram ci na gang gi phyir bde ba'i dbang po kho na 'gog ce na /
translated: What if one obtains it by means of the faculty of mental satisfaction? Why is only the faculty of pleasure refuted?

original: gal te rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan la 'jug par byed na 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la dngos gzhi'i bsam gtan la 'jug par byed na 'thob par 'gyur ro //

original: de ni med de /
analyzed: de ni med de /
translated: That is not so,
