analyzed: sa bon gyi dngos po'o //
translated: The state of being a seed of those is the state of being a seed of those.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: In what?

original: rten la'o // de dag gis bon nyams par ma byas pa ni de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: rten la'o // de dag gis bon nyams par ma byas pa ni de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par ma byas pa ste /
translated: In the basis. The non-destruction of the seed of those is the non-destruction of the state of being a seed of those.

original: de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par ma byas pa de'i phyir de dang ldan no //
analyzed: de dag gi sa bon gyi dngos po nyams par ma byas pa de'i phyir de dang ldan no //
translated: Because of that non-destruction of the state of being a seed of those, one possesses those.

original: gang dag dang zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag dang zhe na /
translated: With what?

original: ma 'bad par skye ba'i dge ba dag dang ngo //
analyzed: ma 'bad par skye ba'i dge ba dag dang ngo //
translated: With the virtues that arise without effort.🔽One is said to be not endowed because of the destruction of the seed.

original: nyams par byas pa'i phyir mi ldan zhes bya ste zhes bya ba de gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: nyams par byas pa'i phyir mi ldan zhes bya ste zhes bya ba de gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: smras pa / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa yin no //
translated: It is the severence of the roots of virtue.

original: de dang yang zhes bya ba ni rten la de dag gis sa bon gyi dngos po bcom pa de yang log par lta bas yin par rig par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang yang zhes bya ba ni rten la de dag gis sa bon gyi dngos po bcom pa de yang log par lta bas yin par rig par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: And also means that the seeds of those virtuous factors in the mind continuum are destroyed by wrong views, not by other means.

original: de'i phyir rgyud la dge ba'i chos rnams kyi sa bon gyi dngos po gtan du bcom pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyud la dge ba'i chos rnams kyi sa bon gyi dngos po gtan du bcom pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, the seeds of virtuous factors in the mind continuum are not permanently destroyed.

original: ji ltar rgyud la 'phags pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa rnams gtan du yang dag par bcom pa ltar snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyud la 'phags pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa rnams gtan du yang dag par bcom pa ltar snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: This means that the seeds of virtuous factors in the mind continuum are not permanently destroyed, just as the arya path completely destroys the seeds of affliction in the mind continuum.

original: gang dag 'bad de skye ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang ste /
analyzed: gang dag 'bad de skye ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang ste /
translated: Those that arise through effort and so on means that those that arise from preparation and those that arise from preparation.

original: de dag skye ba ni de dag skye ba'o //
analyzed: de dag skye ba ni de dag skye ba'o //
translated: Their arising is their generation.

original: de dag skye ba la dbang nyid ni nus pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: de dag skye ba la dbang nyid ni nus pa'i khyad par te /
translated: Their power to arise is their special potency.

original: de thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is unobstructed.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /
translated: In what?

original: rgyud la ste ldan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyud la ste ldan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: In the mind continuum, which is called possession.

original: gang dag dang zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag dang zhe na /
translated: With what?🔽With those that arise from preparation.

original: 'bad de skye ba'i dge ba rnams dang ngo /
analyzed: 'bad de skye ba'i dge ba rnams dang ngo /
translated: and virtue that arises effortlessly.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir 'dir nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams kyi sa bon kho na nus pa'i khyad par ldan pa'i gnas skabs na 'phags pa'i lam gyis rtsa nas ma bton pa dang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyam par par ma byas🔽pa dang ma 'bad par skye ba'i dge ba rnams log par lta bas nyams par ma byas pa dang / dbang nyid kyi dus na rgyus par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir 'dir nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams kyi sa bon kho na nus pa'i khyad par ldan pa'i gnas skabs na 'phags pa'i lam gyis rtsa nas ma bton pa dang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyam par par ma byas pa dang ma 'bad par skye ba'i dge ba rnams log par lta bas nyams par ma byas pa dang / dbang nyid kyi dus na rgyus par gyur pa ste /
translated: Because that is so, here the seeds of afflicted phenomena, when they possess the special power of the state, are not uprooted by the ārya path, are not weakened by the mundane path,🔽are not damaged by wrong view, and are not expanded at the time of the powerful cause.

original: 'bad de skye ba'i dge ba'i sa bon zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'bad de skye ba'i dge ba'i sa bon zhes bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: The context is that the seeds of virtue that arises effortlessly are not damaged by wrong view.

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni ming thob kyi gang bye brag tu sma ba rnams kyis brtags pa lta bu rdzas gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni ming thob kyi gang bye brag tu sma ba rnams kyis brtags pa lta bu rdzas gzhan ni med do //
translated: Possession is not a substance that is a different substantial entity from the phenomena that are possessed, as the Vaibhasikas imagine.🔽What is the seed?

original: sa bon zhes bya ba 'di chi zhig yin zhes bya ba ni rdza su yod du re nas 'dri ba yin no //
analyzed: sa bon zhes bya ba 'di chi zhig yin zhes bya ba ni rdza su yod du re nas 'dri ba yin no //
translated: This is a question that assumes that the seed is a substance.

original: 'bras bu skyed par byed pa la nus pa'i ming dang gzungs gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga skyed par nus pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu skyed par byed pa la nus pa'i ming dang gzungs gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga skyed par nus pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The name and the designation of that which is capable of producing an effect is the five aggregates that are capable of producing an effect.

original: mngon sum ma ni bar du ma chod pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum ma ni bar du ma chod pa'o //
translated: Direct perception is that which is not obstructed.

original: @135b brgyud pa ni thag ring ba'o //
analyzed: @135b brgyud pa ni thag ring ba'o //
translated: Mediated perception is that which is distant.

original: 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba 'di grangs can pa'i 'gyur ba lta bu yin par dogs nas 'dri ba yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba 'di grangs can pa'i 'gyur ba lta bu yin par dogs nas 'dri ba yin no //
translated: What is this so-called transformation? He asks this because he suspects that it is like the transformation of the Sāṃkhyas.

original: rgyud gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid du 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni gzhan nyid du 'byung ba yin no //
translated: It is the transformation into another continuum. It is the occurrence of another.

original: rgyud ces bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grangs can pa dag gi ltar rdzas gnas pa la chos gzhan log na chos gzhan 'byung ba yin pa de bzhin du rgyud gnas pa zhig gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba zhig yin nam zhe
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar grangs can pa dag gi ltar rdzas gnas pa la chos gzhan log na chos gzhan 'byung ba yin pa de bzhin du rgyud gnas pa zhig gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba zhig yin nam zhe
translated: What is this so-called continuum? He asks this because he suspects that it is like the Sāṃkhyas, who say that when one property of a substance that endures is destroyed, another property arises. In the same way, does a continuum that endures transform into another?

original: na / smras pa /
analyzed: na / smras pa /
translated: He says:

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: No, they do not.🔽

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: 'du byed dus gsum pa rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa ste rgyu dang 'bras bu ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dus gsum pa rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa ste rgyu dang 'bras bu ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'o //
translated: Causes and results are causes and results.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni bar ma chad par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni bar ma chad par 'byung ba ste /
translated: Causes and results are said to be uninterruptedly produced.

original: 'du byed dus gsum pa dag la rgyud ces rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: 'du byed dus gsum pa dag la rgyud ces rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The three times of formations are posited as a continuum.🔽From what is it said?

original: gang las gsungs zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mdo gang las gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang las gsungs zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mdo gang las gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The sūtra says:

original: ci zhe na /🔽smras pa / chags pa dang ldan pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag ste lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa skyed pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan zhing rung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yin te gal te thob pa sa bon yin
analyzed: ci zhe na / smras pa / chags pa dang ldan pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag ste lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa skyed pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan zhing rung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yin te gal te thob pa sa bon yin
translated: What?🔽It says: One who possesses attachment is not a suitable or fortunate recipient for generating the four foundations of mindfulness, such as the foundation of mindfulness of the body.

original: nas sa bon ni rtag tu yod pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: nas sa bon ni rtag tu yod pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If obtainment is a seed, since the seed always exists, the four foundations of mindfulness would not arise.

original: khyed kyi lta bur thob pa yin na yang de skyed par mi 'gyur bas 'di ni mtshungs so //
analyzed: khyed kyi lta bur thob pa yin na yang de skyed par mi 'gyur bas 'di ni mtshungs so //
translated: Even if you obtain it, it would not be produced.

original: de lta bas na der ni ldan pa chags pa dang du len pa'am mi sel ba yin te zhes bya ba gnyi gar yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de lta bas na der ni ldan pa chags pa dang du len pa'am mi sel ba yin te zhes bya ba gnyi gar yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it should be said that in that case, it is both possessing attachment and accepting or not eliminating.

original: dang du len pa ni gnang ba'o //
analyzed: dang du len pa ni gnang ba'o //
translated: Accepting is allowing.

original: mi sel ba ni rnam par zhig bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi sel ba ni rnam par zhig bar byed pa'o //
translated: Not eliminating is not destroying.

original: de 'gog pa btags pa'i chos de 'gog pa mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de 'gog pa btags pa'i chos de 'gog pa mi ldan pa'o //
translated: Not possessing the cessation of that imputed phenomenon is the cessation of that imputed phenomenon.🔽It is a completely imputed phenomenon, not a substantially real phenomenon.

original: rnam pa thams cad du btags pa'i chos yin gyi rdzas kyi chos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gal te skye ba'i rgyu yin yang rung gal te rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin yang rung gal te rten gyi bye brag yin yang rung //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du btags pa'i chos yin gyi rdzas kyi chos ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gal te skye ba'i rgyu yin yang rung gal te rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin yang rung gal te rten gyi bye brag yin yang rung //
translated: If it is a cause of arising, if it is a cause of classification, if it is a specific basis,

original: gal te dang du len pa'am mi sel ba yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: gal te dang du len pa'am mi sel ba yin yang rung ste /
translated: if it is accepting or not eliminating,

original: rnam pa thams cad du ste rnam pa kun du btags pa'i chos yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ste rnam pa kun du btags pa'i chos yin no //
translated: it is completely, in every way, an imputed phenomenon.

original: btags pa dang kun rdzob dang tha snyad kyi chos ni btags pa'i chos so //
analyzed: btags pa dang kun rdzob dang tha snyad kyi chos ni btags pa'i chos so //
translated: Designated phenomena are conventional phenomena, nominal phenomena.

original: rdzas kyi chos ma yin pa ni rdzas su yod pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽yang na de rdzas kyang yin la chos kyang yin pas de ni rdzas @136a * //
analyzed: rdzas kyi chos ma yin pa ni rdzas su yod pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // yang na de rdzas kyang yin la chos kyang yin pas de ni rdzas @136a * //
translated: They are not substantial phenomena, that is, they do not have the nature of substantial phenomena.

original: kyi chos to //
analyzed: kyi chos to //
translated: Or else, they are substantial and they are phenomena, thus they are substantial phenomena.

original: gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du yod pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du yod pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: They are not phenomena that exist by way of their own intrinsic identity, like form and so on.

original: slob dpon 'dus bzang na re thob pa ni 'di la ni 'di yod do zhes bya bar shes pa'i rtags dang thob pa'i chos chud mi za ba'i rgyu yin no zhes zer te /
analyzed: slob dpon 'dus bzang na re thob pa ni 'di la ni 'di yod do zhes bya bar shes pa'i rtags dang thob pa'i chos chud mi za ba'i rgyu yin no zhes zer te /
translated: Master Saṅghabhadra says: Obtainment is the cause of nonexpiration of the phenomenon of knowing that this exists for this person.

original: 'di la ni 'di yod do zhes bya bar shes pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni ma grub ste /
analyzed: 'di la ni 'di yod do zhes bya bar shes pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni ma grub ste /
translated: That it is the sign of knowing that this exists for this person is not established.

original: rten gyi khyad par yod na der shes so zhes smra'o //
analyzed: rten gyi khyad par yod na der shes so zhes smra'o //
translated: If the basis exists, it is known.

original: gal te yang thob pa'i chos chud mi za ba'i rgyu thob pa yin par 'dod na /🔽thob pa yongs su gtong bar yang mi 'gyur ba kho na zhig na /
analyzed: gal te yang thob pa'i chos chud mi za ba'i rgyu thob pa yin par 'dod na / thob pa yongs su gtong bar yang mi 'gyur ba kho na zhig na /
translated: If you maintain that the cause of the non-expiration of the obtained dharma is the obtainment,

original: yongs su gtong bar yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yongs su gtong bar yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: then it would not be the case that the obtainment is relinquished.🔽But it is relinquished.

original: de lta bas na 'di ni gtan tshigs su mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di ni gtan tshigs su mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, this is not a proper reason.

original: slob dpon gyi sa bon nus pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin par rnam par gzhag pa de nyid su na 'byin par byed de /🔽nus pa'i khyad par 'di sems las don gzhan pa zhig yin nam /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi sa bon nus pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin par rnam par gzhag pa de nyid su na 'byin par byed de / nus pa'i khyad par 'di sems las don gzhan pa zhig yin nam /
translated: The master’s position is that the seed is defined as a special potency.

original: 'on te don gzhan ma yin pa zhig yin /
analyzed: 'on te don gzhan ma yin pa zhig yin /
translated: Is this special potency something different from the mind or not?

original: gal te don gzhan pa zhig yin no zhe na ni thob pa yod do zhes bya bar grub pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te don gzhan pa zhig yin no zhe na ni thob pa yod do zhes bya bar grub pa yin te /
translated: If it is something different, then obtainment exists,

original: ming tsam la rtsod par zad do //
analyzed: ming tsam la rtsod par zad do //
translated: for this is merely a dispute over names.

original: ji ltar don gzhan ma yin pa zhig yin no zhe na ni mi dge ba yang dge ba'i sa bon yin par khas blangs pa yin la dge ba yang mi dge ba'i sa bon yin par khas blangs pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar don gzhan ma yin pa zhig yin no zhe na ni mi dge ba yang dge ba'i sa bon yin par khas blangs pa yin la dge ba yang mi dge ba'i sa bon yin par khas blangs pa yin te /
translated: If you say that they are not different objects, then you accept that nonvirtue is the seed of virtue and virtue is the seed of nonvirtue.

original: su zhig tsha ba dang me don tha dad pa ma yin pa las tsha ba kho na sreg par byed pa yin gyi me ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur /
analyzed: su zhig tsha ba dang me don tha dad pa ma yin pa las tsha ba kho na sreg par byed pa yin gyi me ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur /
translated: Who would understand that heat and fire are not different objects and that only heat burns but fire does not?

original: dge ba'i sa bon yang mi dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la yod la /🔽de bzhin du mi dge ba'i sa bon yang dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la yod do //
analyzed: dge ba'i sa bon yang mi dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la yod la / de bzhin du mi dge ba'i sa bon yang dge ba'am lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la yod do //
translated: The seed of virtue exists in a nonvirtuous or neutral mind.🔽Similarly, the seed of nonvirtue exists in a virtuous or neutral mind.

original: de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pa'i sa bon yang dge ba dang mi dge ba la yod la /
analyzed: de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pa'i sa bon yang dge ba dang mi dge ba la yod la /
translated: Similarly, the seed of a neutral mind exists in a virtuous or nonvirtue mind.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sa bon yang zag pa med pa la yod /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sa bon yang zag pa med pa la yod /
translated: The seed of contaminated states exists in uncontaminated states.

original: zag pa med pa'i sa bon yang zag pa dang bcas pa la yod pas 'chol ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i sa bon yang zag pa dang bcas pa la yod pas 'chol ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
translated: And since the seed of the uncontaminated is in the contaminated, the error of confusion would ensue.

original: 'di la bdag smra bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di la bdag smra bar bya ste /
translated: We respond:

original: don tha dad pa ma yin na 'chol ba'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don tha dad pa ma yin na 'chol ba'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are not different, the error of confusion would ensue.

original: sa bon de ni sems las don gzhan pa ma yin la /
analyzed: sa bon de ni sems las don gzhan pa ma yin la /
translated: That seed is not a different object from the mind.

original: don gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it not a different object.

original: brten nas btags pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brten nas btags pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of a dependent designation.

original: @136b ji ste don gzhan pa med do zhes byas na yang nyes pa med de /
analyzed: @136b ji ste don gzhan pa med do zhes byas na yang nyes pa med de /
translated: If you say that it does not exist as a different object, there is no error.

original: dge ba'i sems skyes pas ni rang gi rgyud kyi sems rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'am gzhan gyi rigs dang mthun pa la sa bon 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems skyes pas ni rang gi rgyud kyi sems rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'am gzhan gyi rigs dang mthun pa la sa bon 'jog par byed do //
translated: When a virtuous mind arises, it plants a seed in the mindstream of the mind that is either of the same type or of a different type.

original: rgyu'i khyad par de las 'bras bu'i khyad par 'gyur bas de las ni sems khyad par can de skye ste /
analyzed: rgyu'i khyad par de las 'bras bu'i khyad par 'gyur bas de las ni sems khyad par can de skye ste /
translated: Since a difference in result arises from a difference in cause, a special mind arises from that.

original: sems khyad par can de ni dge ba'i sa bon gyis dgos pa byed pa la nus pa de skye'o //🔽de bzhin du mi dge bas kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sems rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'am /
analyzed: sems khyad par can de ni dge ba'i sa bon gyis dgos pa byed pa la nus pa de skye'o // de bzhin du mi dge bas kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sems rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'am /
translated: That special mind is generated from the seed of virtue that is the cause of its function.

original: gzhan gyi rigs dang mthun pa las sa bon 'jog par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rigs dang mthun pa las sa bon 'jog par 'gyur la /
translated: Similarly, nonvirtue plants seeds in the mindstream of a virtuous mind that is concordant with its type or in a mind that is concordant with a different type.

original: de las ni sems khyad par can mi dge ba'i sa bon gyis dgos pa byed pa la nus pa de skye'o //🔽de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pas kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sems rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'am /
analyzed: de las ni sems khyad par can mi dge ba'i sa bon gyis dgos pa byed pa la nus pa de skye'o // de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pas kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sems rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'am /
translated: From that, a special nonvirtuous mind is generated that is the cause of its function.

original: gzhan gyi rigs dang mthun pa la sa bon 'jog par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rigs dang mthun pa la sa bon 'jog par 'gyur la /
translated: Similarly, a neutral mind plants seeds in the mindstream of a virtuous mind that is concordant with its type or in a mind that is concordant with a different type.

original: de las ni khyad par can lung du ma bstan pa'i sa bon gyis dgos pa byed pa la nus pa de skye'o //
analyzed: de las ni khyad par can lung du ma bstan pa'i sa bon gyis dgos pa byed pa la nus pa de skye'o //
translated: From that, a special neutral mind is generated that is the cause of its function.

original: zag pa dang bcas pas kyang zag pa med pa'i sems la sa bon 'jog par 'gyur la /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pas kyang zag pa med pa'i sems la sa bon 'jog par 'gyur la /
translated: A contaminated mind plants seeds in the uncontaminated mindstream.

original: zag pa med pas kyang zag pa dang bcas pa la 'jog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zag pa med pas kyang zag pa dang bcas pa la 'jog par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, a contaminated mind would be posited as a seed of an uncontaminated mind, and vice versa.

original: de ltar na phan tshun sa bon 'jog par byed pa dang phan tshun skyed par byed de /
analyzed: de ltar na phan tshun sa bon 'jog par byed pa dang phan tshun skyed par byed de /
translated: Thus they would mutually plant seeds and mutually generate each other.

original: sems gzhan las skye ba na phan tshun bsgo bar bya ba dang sgo bar byed pa nyid du 'jug go //🔽dge bas mi dge ba'i sems la nus pa'i khyad par bzhag ces te mi dge ba de dge ba nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: sems gzhan las skye ba na phan tshun bsgo bar bya ba dang sgo bar byed pa nyid du 'jug go // dge bas mi dge ba'i sems la nus pa'i khyad par bzhag ces te mi dge ba de dge ba nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: When a mind arises from another mind, they would engage as that which is to be caused to arise and that which causes arising.🔽A virtuous mind would not be posited as a special potency of a nonvirtuous mind, and a nonvirtuous mind would not be posited as a special potency of a virtuous mind.

original: dge ba de mi dge ba nyid du 'gyur ba yang med de nus pa'i khyad par tsam du zad do //
analyzed: dge ba de mi dge ba nyid du 'gyur ba yang med de nus pa'i khyad par tsam du zad do //
translated: Also, a nonvirtuous mind would not become virtuous and a virtuous mind would not become nonvirtuous, because they are merely special potencies.

original: nus pa dang sa bon dang bag chags zhes bya ba 'di ni don gcig go //🔽de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pas zag pa med pa la nus pa'i khyad par bzhag la /
analyzed: nus pa dang sa bon dang bag chags zhes bya ba 'di ni don gcig go // de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pas zag pa med pa la nus pa'i khyad par bzhag la /
translated: Potency, seed, and latent afflictive states are equivalent.🔽Also, a contaminated mind would be posited as a special potency of an uncontaminated mind, and vice versa.

original: zag pa med pas kyang zag pa dang bcas pa la nus pa'i khyad par bzhag ces te /
analyzed: zag pa med pas kyang zag pa dang bcas pa la nus pa'i khyad par bzhag ces te /
translated: Also, an uncontaminated mind would be posited as a special potency of a contaminated mind, and vice versa.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa de yang zag pa med par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa de yang zag pa med par mi 'gyur la /
translated: And that which is contaminated would not become uncontaminated,🔽and that which is uncontaminated would not become contaminated.

original: zag pa med pa yang zag pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar mi dge ba la sogs pa'i bag chags la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa yang zag pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar mi dge ba la sogs pa'i bag chags la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: This should be applied to the latent states of nonvirtue and so on.

original: bye brag tu smra ba khyed kyi la yang bsam par bya ste /🔽gang gi tshe zag pa dang bcas @137a * //🔽pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su zag pa med pa 'am /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba khyed kyi la yang bsam par bya ste / gang gi tshe zag pa dang bcas @137a * // pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su zag pa med pa 'am /
translated: You Vaibhasikas should also contemplate this:🔽When a contaminated mind arises immediately after an uncontaminated mind

original: zag pa med pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su zag pa dang bcas pa skye ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su zag pa dang bcas pa skye ba de'i tshe /
translated: or an uncontaminated mind arises immediately after a contaminated mind,

original: ci zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs sam /
analyzed: ci zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs sam /
translated: at that time, does the former contaminated or uncontaminated mind

original: zag pa med pa'i tshogs snga ma tshogs phyi ma skye ba la mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bor nus pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i tshogs snga ma tshogs phyi ma skye ba la mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bor nus pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam /
translated: possess the potency to be the equivalent immediately preceding condition and so on for the generation of the latter contaminated or uncontaminated mind?

original: 'on te nus pa dang mi ldan pa zhig yin /
analyzed: 'on te nus pa dang mi ldan pa zhig yin /
translated: Or does it not possess potency?

original: de las cir 'gyur /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur /
translated: What is the consequence of that?

original: gal te nus pa dang mi ldan na ni 'di'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te nus pa dang mi ldan na ni 'di'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does not possess potency, then its equivalent immediately preceding condition and so on would degenerate.

original: 'on te nus pa dang ldan no zhe na /🔽zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la yod pa de zag pa dang bcas pa zhig gam /
analyzed: 'on te nus pa dang ldan no zhe na / zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la yod pa de zag pa dang bcas pa zhig gam /
translated: But if it does possess potency,🔽then does the potency that exists in a contaminated mind

original: 'on te zag pa med pa zhig yin /
analyzed: 'on te zag pa med pa zhig yin /
translated: exist in a contaminated mind or in an uncontaminated mind?

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems de yang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i sems gzhan gyis mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bo byed pa na /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems de yang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i sems gzhan gyis mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bo byed pa na /
translated: When a contaminated mind acts as the entity of the equivalent immediately preceding condition and so on of another contaminated or uncontaminated mind,

original: ci nus pa gang kho nas zag pa dang bcas pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bo byed par 'gyur ba de kho nas zag pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci nus pa gang kho nas zag pa dang bcas pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bo byed par 'gyur ba de kho nas zag pa med pa yin nam /
translated: does it act as the entity of a contaminated equivalent immediately preceding condition and so on by means of the potency that is itself contaminated?🔽Or does it act as the entity of an uncontaminated equivalent immediately preceding condition and so on by means of the potency that is itself uncontaminated?

original: gal te de kho nas yin na ni ji ltar nus pa 'tshol bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te de kho nas yin na ni ji ltar nus pa 'tshol bar mi 'gyur /
translated: If it acts by means of that which is itself uncontaminated, then how could it not be investigated as to its potency?

original: 'on te gzhan zhig gi zag pa med pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa byed par 'gyur na ni ji ltar na gcig la sems de las gzhan ma yin pa'i nus pa 'di gnyis kyi ngo bo tha dad pa nyid dang 'bras bu tha🔽dad pa nyid du rung bar yang 'gyur na ni /🔽kho bo cag gi ltar na yang sems las gzhan ma yin pa'i nus pa rnams de la gnas pa dang / 'bras bu tha dad par yang 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ba yang ci rigs par de dang 'dra ba kho nar nus pa de dag gi ngo bo tha dad pa dang /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan zhig gi zag pa med pa'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa byed par 'gyur na ni ji ltar na gcig la sems de las gzhan ma yin pa'i nus pa 'di gnyis kyi ngo bo tha dad pa nyid dang 'bras bu tha dad pa nyid du rung bar yang 'gyur na ni / kho bo cag gi ltar na yang sems las gzhan ma yin pa'i nus pa rnams de la gnas pa dang / 'bras bu tha dad par yang 'gyur ro // de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems kyi mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ba yang ci rigs par de dang 'dra ba kho nar nus pa de dag gi ngo bo tha dad pa dang /
translated: But if it is another uncontaminated mind that is the equivalent immediately preceding condition and so on, then how could these two powers that are not different from that mind be different in nature and different in result?🔽If they are different in nature and different in result, then according to our system, the powers that are not different from mind would also be different in nature and different in result.

original: 'bras bu tha dad par yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad par yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, it is said that contaminated minds are the equivalent immediately preceding condition and so on of uncontaminated minds and that it is correct to say that they are different in nature and different in result.

original: des ni mi dge ba de yang dge ba'i sa bon yin par khas blangs pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa gang yin pa de rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des ni mi dge ba de yang dge ba'i sa bon yin par khas blangs pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa gang yin pa de rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is illogical to say that nonvirtue is the seed of virtue.

original: dge bas nus pa'i khyad par bzhag pas khyad par can du byas pa'i mi dge ba'i sems nus pa can ni mi dge ba'i sa bon @137b gyi bya ba mi byed do //
analyzed: dge bas nus pa'i khyad par bzhag pas khyad par can du byas pa'i mi dge ba'i sems nus pa can ni mi dge ba'i sa bon @137b gyi bya ba mi byed do //
translated: A nonvirtuous mind that is empowered by being made special through the establishment of a special capacity by virtue does not perform the function of a seed of nonvirtue.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What does it do?

original: dge ba'i sa bon gyi bya ba kho na byed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i sa bon gyi bya ba kho na byed do //
translated: It performs the function of a seed of virtue.

original: rang gi nus pa'i khyad par bskyed pas khyad par can du byas pa'i mi dge bas ni mi dge ba'i sa bon gyis bya ba byed na de ji ltar na dge ba'i sa bon mi dge ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di brjod /
analyzed: rang gi nus pa'i khyad par bskyed pas khyad par can du byas pa'i mi dge bas ni mi dge ba'i sa bon gyis bya ba byed na de ji ltar na dge ba'i sa bon mi dge ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di brjod /
translated: If nonvirtue that is made special by generating a special capacity performs the function of a seed of nonvirtue, then how could it be said that the seed of virtue is nonvirtue?

original: mi dge ba'i sems la dge ba'i sa bon de bzhag na ji ltar mi dge bar mi 'gyur zhes smra bar byed na ni khyed kyis sa bon gyi don mi shes te /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i sems la dge ba'i sa bon de bzhag na ji ltar mi dge bar mi 'gyur zhes smra bar byed na ni khyed kyis sa bon gyi don mi shes te /
translated: If you say that if the seed of virtue is placed in a nonvirtuous mind, how could it not become nonvirtue, then you do not understand the meaning of seed.

original: dge ba'i sems skye bas ni ji ltar na mngon sum mam brgyud pas sems de rang skyed par rung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nus pa'i khyad par can gyi sems mi dge ba bskyed par 'gyur bas sa bon ni nus pa'i khyad par kho nar zad kyi
analyzed: dge ba'i sems skye bas ni ji ltar na mngon sum mam brgyud pas sems de rang skyed par rung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nus pa'i khyad par can gyi sems mi dge ba bskyed par 'gyur bas sa bon ni nus pa'i khyad par kho nar zad kyi
translated: The seed is merely a special potency.

original: sa bon zhes bya ba cung zad med de /
analyzed: sa bon zhes bya ba cung zad med de /
translated: It does not exist in the least,

original: btags pa'i yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: btags pa'i yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists as a designation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir thob pa dang ma thob pa dag ni btags pa'i yod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thob pa dang ma thob pa dag ni btags pa'i yod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore obtainment and nonobtainment are said to exist as designations.

original: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de dag rdzas su yod pa kho na yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de dag rdzas su yod pa kho na yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: Vaibhasikas say that they definitely exist as substances.

original: chos 'das pa rnams kyi thob pa 'das pa yang yod /
analyzed: chos 'das pa rnams kyi thob pa 'das pa yang yod /
translated: Obtainment of past phenomena is past,🔽and so on.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ba la 'das pa rnams kyi ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ba la 'das pa rnams kyi ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Obtainment of past phenomena is as follows.

original: nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi thob pa 'das pa ni gang skyes la 'gag pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi thob pa 'das pa ni gang skyes la 'gag pa ste /
translated: Obtainment of past afflicted states is that which arises and ceases.

original: de ni sngar skye ba yang yod /
analyzed: de ni sngar skye ba yang yod /
translated: It exists prior to arising.🔽Obtainment of past uncontaminated states is that which arises and has not ceased.

original: lhan cig skye ba yang yod /
analyzed: lhan cig skye ba yang yod /
translated: There is also that which arises simultaneously.

original: dus phyis skye ba yang yod do //
analyzed: dus phyis skye ba yang yod do //
translated: There is also that which arises later.

original: de dag nyid kyi thob pa ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa yin te phyis skye ba'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi thob pa ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa yin te phyis skye ba'o //
translated: The future obtainment of those very past and present states is that which has not yet arisen, that which will arise later.

original: de ltar byung ba ni skyes la ma 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar byung ba ni skyes la ma 'gags pa'o //
translated: That which has occurred is that which has arisen and not yet ceased.

original: ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi thob pa yang 'das pa ni gang sngar skye ba skyes la 'gags pa yin no //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi thob pa yang 'das pa ni gang sngar skye ba skyes la 'gags pa yin no //
translated: The past obtainment of future states is that which has arisen and ceased prior to the arising of the future state.

original: ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa yin no //
translated: The future obtainment of future states is that which has not yet arisen.

original: da ltar byung ba ni gang sngar skye ba skyes la ma 'gags pa yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ni gang sngar skye ba skyes la ma 'gags pa yin no //
translated: The present obtainment of future states is that which has arisen and not yet ceased prior to the arising of the future state.

original: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba rnams kyi thob pa yang 'das pa ni sngar skye ba skyes la 'gags pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du da ltar byung ba rnams kyi thob pa yang 'das pa ni sngar skye ba skyes la 'gags pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, the past obtainment of present states is that which has arisen and ceased prior to the arising of the present state.

original: ma 'ongs pa ni gang ma skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ni gang ma skyes pa yin no //
translated: The future obtainment of present states is that which has not yet arisen.

original: da ltar byung ba ni gang lhan cig skye ba yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ni gang lhan cig skye ba yin no //
translated: The present obtainment of present states is that which arises simultaneously.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi spyi bzung nas de skad du bshad pa yin gyi 'das pa gcig la gdon mi za bar thob pa rnam pa gsum yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi spyi bzung nas de skad du bshad pa yin gyi 'das pa gcig la gdon mi za bar thob pa rnam pa gsum yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This is explained in terms of the general class of past states and so on, but it is not definite that the three times exist for each past state.

original: lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye //
analyzed: lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye //
translated: Obtainment of that not declared arises simultaneously.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa 'das pa la ni thob pa 'das pa'am /🔽ma @138a * //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa 'das pa la ni thob pa 'das pa'am / ma @138a * //
translated: Obtainment of past maturational results does not exist in the past or future.🔽Obtainment of that not declared arises simultaneously.

original: 'ongs pa med do //
analyzed: 'ongs pa med do //
translated: Obtainment of that not declared arises simultaneously with it.

original: gal te rdzas re re'i thob pa rnam par 'jog par byed na ni srid pa'i phyir de lta bur yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te rdzas re re'i thob pa rnam par 'jog par byed na ni srid pa'i phyir de lta bur yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If the obtainment of each substance were posited, then it would be like that because it is possible.

original: nyon mongs pa can dang skyes nas thob pa'i dge ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i thob pa ni gdon mi za bar 'das pa la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can dang skyes nas thob pa'i dge ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i thob pa ni gdon mi za bar 'das pa la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The obtainment of past afflicted states and virtuous states obtained from birth is definitely past and so on.

original: so so'i skye bo la 'phags pa'i lam zag pa med pa ma skyes pa'i thob pa 'das pa ni med do //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo la 'phags pa'i lam zag pa med pa ma skyes pa'i thob pa 'das pa ni med do //
translated: But the obtainment of the unarisen ārya uncontaminated path in an ordinary being is not past.

original: spyir bstan pa 'di ni /
analyzed: spyir bstan pa 'di ni /
translated: This general statement is

original: lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye //
analyzed: lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye //
translated: Obtainment of that not declared arises simultaneously.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dmigs kyis bsal ba dang bcas pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dmigs kyis bsal ba dang bcas pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Therefore you should understand that this is a specific refutation.

original: 'dus ma byas rnams kyis thob pa 'das pa ni skyes la 'gags pa yin la /🔽ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas rnams kyis thob pa 'das pa ni skyes la 'gags pa yin la / ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa yin /

original: da ltar byung ba ni skyes la ma 'gags pa yin te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ni skyes la ma 'gags pa yin te /

original: 'dir ni rtogs par sla bas mdor ma byas so //
analyzed: 'dir ni rtogs par sla bas mdor ma byas so //

analyzed: de nyid kyi gzugs med pa rnams kyi ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa yin no //

analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa'i yang 'dod pa na spyod pa 'di lta ste /

analyzed: sprul ba'i sems rnams kyi ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa'i ni de'i khams kyi thob pa de'i khams pa kho na yin no //🔽ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa bzhi //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khams su ma gtogs pa zag pa med pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams kyi thob pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhi po 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang / zag pa med pa ste ma gtogs pa thams cad kyi mdor bsdu na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
